action.action-desc: Mr. Torres of New York introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To require the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and the Federal Open Market Committee to consider inflation, employment, and financial stability when setting interest rates.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Financial Stability Mandate Act.
Section 2A of the Federal Reserve Act is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking The Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and the Federal Open Market Committee shall and inserting the following:

subsection.text: The Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and the Federal Open Market Committee shall

paragraph.text: by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: The Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and the Federal Open Market Committee shall, when setting interest rates, consider inflation, employment, and financial stability.
